org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm
Class BackoffCM

java.lang.Object
  org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm.AbstractContentionManager
      org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm.BackoffCM
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentionManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
Karma, KarmaLockStealer, Polite, Polka, Timestamp
public abstract class BackoffCM
extends AbstractContentionManager

Abstract class for all contention managers that perform back-off. It provides functionality for that purpose like thread local object holding the number of consecutive back-offs, etc.

Since:
1.2
Author:
Yoav Cohen, yoav.cohen@cs.tau.ac.il

Nested Class Summary
protected static class BackoffCM.BackoffData
          This class stores all the data required to achieve back-off for a particular thread
